title: CM grieves over loss in Upper Chitral, directs immediate relief activities
content:
PESHAWAR, Aug 15 (APP): Chief Minister, Khyber Pakhtunkhwa Mahmood Khan has expressed sorrow over the losses due to glacial outburst and floods in Yarkhoon area of Upper Chitral.
Expressing grief, he directed district administration and rescue workers to reach at the spot and start relief activities.
He also directed concerned authorities to compile a report of losses and provide essential items to affected population.
